div.p: ON THE SPACE OF THE MELKOT.
I KNEW IT HAD TO HAPPEN.
IF YOU DON'T WANT ANY TROUBLE,
WHAT ARE YOU DOING IN MY TOWN?
TO BE AT THE O.K. CORRAL
TAKE A CLOSE LOOK AT ME.
WHO DO YOU THINK I AM?
WELL, I KNOW THIS IS HARD
IT JUST TAKES A BIT OF
A LOT OF PEOPLE AND THINGS
LOCK IN AND BEAM US UP.
WE HAVE TO FIND A WAY
I KNOW THE PLACE TO GET
JUST STAND HERE AND TAKE IT!
IF YOU THINK I'M GOING TO--
A WAY TO CHANGE THIS TIME
IT WOULD BE WORTH A TRY,
ONE OTHER PLACE I CAN TRY.
FROM THIS! YOU AND YOUR BOYS
TO TAKE CARE OF THE EARPS.
GET DOWN TO THE O.K. CORRAL,
WOULD BE ENOUGH TO KILL YOU.
I SPEAK FOR A VAST ALLIANCE
WILL COME OUT TO MEET YOU.
IT SEEMED TO YOU, MR. SPOCK?
